Title: The Truce
Plot: When Alex has sex with a lacrosse player's girlfriend, he unwittingly breaks a 23-year football/lacrosse team truce, causing a take-no-prisoners war which he must figure out how to end.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
GuestStars: Russ Hunt, Omari Newton, Chantal Quesnelle
